room_features:
Room Features

Stunning views, inspired décor and unmatched exclusivity epitomize the Signature Grand Suites, a collection of intimate residences for our discerning guests. These suites exude an aura of quiet luxury- a refined, accommodating oasis in the world's most energetic, exciting city.  Located throughout the hotel, these suites are available with one to three bedrooms and range in size from 1,300 to 2,000 square feet, or 121 to 186 square meters. 

Bed & Bath Experience

Each unique in design, all Signature Grand Suites are named for a quintessential aspect of the hotel or illustrious figure who once called The Pierre home. Two of the Signature Grand Suites offer private, spacious outdoor terraces, and all feature ample living and dining space. Lofty ceilings and large windows make way for abundant natural light; some suites offer views of the soaring Manhattan skyline, while others are framed by panoramic views of Central Park. 

An entry foyer complements the regal living / dining room. A comfortable sofa, two side tables, coffee table, two exquisitely upholstered armchairs, and two ottomans adorn the grand suite.  A dining table that seats four to six guests, an executive desk with chair, a wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace with console and minibar forms part of the suite. The grand suite is complemented by a well-appointed pantry kitchen for private gatherings.

The suites are comprised of two bedrooms. The master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two nightstands, an armchair with side table and Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock.

The second bedroom are comprised of twin beds, one nightstand between the two beds and console with a 40” TV. Four fixture Turkish marble clad bathrooms features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
service_amenities:
Signature Grand Suite privileges include full American Breakfast at Perrine or through Room Service, Complimentary pressing of 5 garments upon arrival, Complimentary juices and soft drinks from the minibar, Direct private phone number to our Concierge Team reserved for Grand Suite guests.  Additional hotel services also include 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary Jaguar house car subject to availability.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 4 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, Complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in. For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
